description: Images from Paris as the delicate work of removing melted scaffolding from the cathedral begins.
title: Notre-Dame fire: Work starts to remove melted scaffolding
title_page: Notre-Dame fire: Work starts to remove melted scaffolding - BBC News
maintext: The building is still not entirely out of danger and only when this operation is finished in three or four months' time can they start thinking about the real response to the disaster: reconstruction and maybe redesign.
